chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally_2d P (x + t * (u - x)) (y + t * (v - y))) x y

Premises:
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_and : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v /\ Q u v) x y
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
formule : forall (x h l1 l2 : R) (f1 f2 : R -> R), h <> 0 -> f2 x <> 0 ->...-> (f1 (x + h) / f2 (x + h) - f1 x / f2 x) / h - (l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)² = / f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1) + l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h)) - f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2) + l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
MVT_cor3 : forall (f f' : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> derivable_pt_lim f x (f' x)) -> exists c : R, a <= c /\ c <= b /\ f b = f a + f' c * (b - a)
RiemannInt_const_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l u : R) (h : Riemann_integrable f a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> l <= f x <= u) -> l * (b - a) <= RiemannInt h <= u * (b - a)
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 ->...-> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d ->...-> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
locally_singleton : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> P x where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
Int_SF = fix Int_SF (l k : Rlist) {struct l} : R := match l with | nil => 0 | cons a l' => match k with | nil => 0 | cons x nil => 0 | cons x (cons y k') => a * (y - x) + Int_SF l' (cons y k') end end : Rlist -> Rlist -> R
UniformSpace.sort = fun t : UniformSpace => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : UniformSpace -> Type UniformSpace.sort is a coercion
Rabs_mult : forall x y : R, Rabs (x * y) = Rabs x * Rabs y
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
